channel.title: Animal cruelty/testing
channel.description: what do you think about this? do you think it should stop or be a sick and twisted individual and say its ok to kill animals and mistreat them they tihnk like us, feel like use, hurt like us, and die like us... post what you think

item.title: Animal cruelty/testing
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Somethings are necessary i mean like tests on Cancer and HIV. But makeup and stuff thats just pointless and sick… i mean animals don’t roll up at the supermarket and get the tear-free shampoo which was tested on them. If we want to make tear-free shampoo, put it in our own eyes, or don’t try it at all.

Read full topic

@KyleGut3 wrote:

Really, only Vegans are allowed to bitch at this in my opinion. You can’t say “Fuck this! Its messed up!” To studies w/ animals, but not say the same to animals being born ONLY to be slaughtered/have their fur/eggs/milk/etc. taken.

item.title: Animal cruelty/testing
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I guess… Survival of the Fittest. I know that may sound harsh, but how do you think we test vaccines and medicine? We first test it on animals. Look at it this way. Would you rather have them test on human volunteers or on animals?

If we tested on only human volunteers, there would be a huge gap in taking steps to find cures for cancer or AIDS or HPV and such. Sure the little rat that we normally test on will live for another 2 years, but another 20,000 die every year due to AIDS, and many more from HPV, and EXTREMELY more from cancer.

It’s all in how you look at it.

Read full topic

item.title: Animal cruelty/testing
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Salemthegoodkitty:

I dont know how anyone could be so cold hearted to test chemicals and stuff on animals. Most of them die or go insane because of isolation. I think we should find alternative ways to test. I know that sounds almost impossible and frankly it is. But i just dont like to see animals being killed because they shove chemicals down their throats.

I say it’s ok if we do it for food, but not just to test.

Read full topic

item.title: Animal cruelty/testing
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

Haha your all hypocrites.

You say it like its a bad thing to test animals with drugs and bodily applications. And you think it doesn’t hurt when McDonalds breeds 5000 chickens and has their heads chopped off? You don’t think its wrong when you order a 10 piece KFC meal and ravage it like scavengers?

So in reality you don’t really have an option. If your a vegetarian you have the opportunity to say its wrong. If your a nonvegetarian I’m afraid you choices are limited to none.

Read full topic
